attributes.action: observe the laws and rules of this land by ensuring that all Members of Parliament repay every penny of expenses claimed since their election to Parliament where the claimed amount has no link with their ability to carry out their function as elected members of Her Majestey's Government.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: What gives these people any rights to break or bend the Law over and above any other person in the United Kingdom.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
